title: IMS Guide
subtitle: Migrating from VMware to Red Hat Virtualization 4.2.8 or Red Hat OpenStack Platform 13/14

abstract.para: This guide describes how to plan, perform, and troubleshoot a migration of virtual machines from VMware 5.5 to Red Hat Virtualization 4.2.8 or Red Hat OpenStack Platform 13 or 14. The migration is performed with Red Hat CloudForms 4.7.
